verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> you a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>spot,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> and on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> <S%H5923>yoke:<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he may <S%H3318>bring<s%> her <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and one shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> his face:

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>directly<s%> <S%H5227><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> times:

And one shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%> her <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and her <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and her <S%H1818>blood,<s%> with her <S%H6569>dung,<s%> shall he <S%H8313>burn:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H8313>burns<s%> her shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> up the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them up <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>purification<s%> for <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

And he that <S%H622>gathers<s%> the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> and it shall be to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, for a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
He that <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

He shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> with it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H2398>purify<s%> not himself the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> then the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall not be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H2398>purifies<s%> not himself, <S%H2930>defiles<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation<s%> was not <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on him, he shall be <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> on him.

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in a <S%H168>tent:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in the <S%H168>tent,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6781>covering<s%> <S%H6616>bound<s%> on it, is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> one that is <S%H2491>slain<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> or a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body,<s%> or a <S%H6106>bone<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> or a <S%H6913>grave,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And for an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> person they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of the <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%> of <S%H2403>purification<s%> for <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>thereto<s%> in a <S%H3627>vessel:<s%>

And a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> <S%H120><s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and on the <S%H5315>persons<s%> that were <S%H8033>there,<s%> and on him that <S%H5060>touched<s%> a <S%H6106>bone,<s%> or one <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> one <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6913>grave:<s%>

And the <S%H2889>clean<s%> person shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> on the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself, and <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> at <S%H6153>even.<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall not <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation<s%> has not been <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on him; he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> to them, that he that <S%H5137>sprinkles<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and he that <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> person <S%H5060>touches<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H5060>touches<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even.<s%>
